name: Foxcatsquirrel
description:
Leap and glide to chomp food and dodge baddies in single-screen arcade action! 🍦🍪🍔 Chomp tasty food in this quick-paced arcade game 💫 Repel enemies with your shockwave 🎵 Hum irritatingly catchy music!

Play in the browser, or download to keep for PC, Mac, Linux or Raspberry Pi.

Controls:
  • Use the arrow keys to run around
  • ❎ to jump!
    • Hold ❎ while in the air to glide
  • Z for a force field that repels enemies (watch out – it has a cooldown!)
  • Press ⬇️ on a platform to drop through

Collect 10 food then grab the key to advance to the next level

Avoid enemies – they can't be killed, but they can be repelled or avoided!

Feedback welcome!

This is my first-ever game, and I've absolutely loved making it. It's not perfect, but I'm truly proud of it.

I'd love to hear your thoughts and highest scores! You can find me on Twitter @Foxcatsquirrel. 

Credits

Design, graphics, music by James Newton

Based on platformer engine code by NerdyTeachers.com.

Uses a high score table by grumpydev on the Pico-8 BBS.

--

Foxcatsquirrel is part of the Finally Finish Something Jam.
